description: I'm currently a student at Georgebrown College studying Computer Programming.
Proficient in Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, C++, C# and Python.
Occasionally developing games and web apps using various frameworks.

skills: Specialized understanding of Java and a high proficiency in other languages such as C++, C# and Python.
Developed web applications using Django, ASP.Net, Spring, NodeJS and various PHP frameworks.
Utilized Visual Studio Code and Eclipse as IDE's. Slack, Git and Trello for Agile Project Management.
Experience using statistical computer languages such as Python (Scikit-learn, Pandas) and SQL to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.
Avidly researching and applying Game Engine Architectures in C++ and Java to develop my own custom game engine.
Utilized numerous pipeline tools to automate and control the source of my projects,such as Github, Heroku, Travis CI and Circle CI.
